text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump You really are a special kind of stupid aren't you? The coronavirus came from China, not the Mexican border you imbecile. Someone please get him a map, teach him and his dad how to read it, and explain how a fricking virus works. The whole family is clueless.
